snippet.title: Louny Balloony Trailer
snippet.description:
A Trailer for my up-and-coming game Louny Balloony!

It's a side-scrolling platformer, but there's also flying mechanics and stuff.

DEMO AVAILABLE HERE: https://harold-krell.itch.io/louny-balloony

DEV TWITTER HERE: https://twitter.com/harold_krell
